segments.text: Shall we visit the Summer Palace tomorrow ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . I don't want to leave Beijing without visiting it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How far is it from our hotel ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: If we start early , do we have some time for Yuanmingyuan ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think so . We can go there in the afternoon if you like .
segments.speaker: S2
